entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
